title: Bug 104630: Column icons don't show up in connecting derby database
description: When connecting to a derby database, the column icons do not appear in the Data Explorer view.
OB: When connecting to a derby database and creating a dataset in the Edit Dataset window, the column icons are not visible.
EB: When connecting to a derby database and creating a dataset in the Edit Dataset window, the column icons should be visible.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 1. Create a new project. 2. Create a new report. 3. In the Data Explorer view, create a new Data Source to connect to a derby database using the following configuration:
- Driver Class: com.ibm.db2.jcc.DB2Driver
- Database URL: jdbc:db2://spmdb:1527/gui
- User Name: root
- Password: root
4. After setting up the Data Source, create a new dataset. 5. In the Edit Dataset window, select 'Query' as the data source. 6. [Additional steps needed to reproduce the issue, if any]
